frameDefinitions: An Agent attempts to achieve a Goal using some Means.
An Evaluator participates in an Experience (or metonymically, a salient Entity of the Experience), often for the first time, in order to form an opinion about its quality.
A Topical_entity has properties which are affected by the existence and association of an Entity.
A Self_mover intentionally moves in a Directionon a Path relative to landmark that is neither the Source nor the Goal of the overall motion.
An Agent attempts to achieve a Goal.
This frame is concerned with the likelihood of a Hypothetical_event occurring.
frameExamples: John <t>tried</t> using a crowbar to open the door.
Have you <t>tried</t> my latest get-rich-quick scheme? INI
By the 1920s a characteristic book <t>had</t> black and white photographic illustrations only .
Ambrose Powell <t>forded</t> over on one horse, and we drove the others after him.
It is <t>likely</t> that he'll arrive late.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Agent</fen> makes an attempt to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen>.
The <fen>Goal</fen> is what the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to achieve.
This role identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which an attempt occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the attempt occurs.
The place where an attempt is made.
The person (or metonymic manifestation thereof) that participates in the <fen>Experience</fen>.
The activity or event that the <fen>Evaluator</fen> participates in.
<fen>Entity</fen> is something that the <fen>Evaluator</fen> uses to try an <fen>Experience</fen>, and metonymically stands in for the <fen>Experience</fen>.
A more explicit description of what the <fen>Evaluator</fen> seeks to learn by having the <fen>Experience</fen>.
The temporal location during which the <fen>Experience</fen> occurs.
The physical location in which the <fen>Experience</fen> occurs.
Some entity, abstract or concrete, which is stated to exist and be associated with the <fen>Topical_entity</fen>.
The entity under discussion, whose states and properties are impacted by its association with the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Entity</fen> exists and is associated with the <fen>Topical_entity</fen>
The place where the <fen>Entity</fen> is associated with the <fen>Topical_entity</fen>.
This is a sentient being or a vehicle steered by a sentient being which moves.
Any expression which implies a definite starting-point of motion expresses the frame element <fen>Source</fen>.
Any description of a trajectory of motion which is neither a <fen>Source</fen> nor a <fen>Goal</fen> expresses the frame element <fen>Path</fen>, excluding directional expressions:
Any expression which indicates where the <fen>Self_mover</fen> ends up as a result of the motion expresses the frame element <fen>Goal</fen>.
The configuration formed by the entire <fen>Path</fen> of the <fen>Self_mover</fen>, taken simultaneously.
The direction in which the <fen>Self_mover</fen> goes.
The time at which the motion takes place.
The <fen>Place</fen> is where the motion (which is specified by a <fen>Source</fen>, <fen>Path</fen> or <fen>Goal</fen>) is located.
The <fen>Agent</fen> makes an attempt to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen>.
The <fen>Goal</fen> is what the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to achieve.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the attempt occurs.
The place where an attempt is made.
The state of affairs or occurrence whose likelihood is assessed.
When the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Dana</fex> tried a crowbar.
John tried using a crowbar <fex>to enter the locked door</fex>.
Dana tried <fex>using a crowbar</fex>.
<fex>On the bridge</fex> he tried the crowbar.
<fex>She</fex> tested out six cars before finding the one she liked.
Have you ever tried <fex>working out with kettlebells?</fex>
We tried out <fex>the games</fex>, and they're fun.
I tried out my neighbors vacuums <fex>to see if they met my needs</fex>
Try it out <fex>at midnight</fex>.
I tried it for the first time <fex>at home</fex>.
<fex>We</fex> drive down dusty roads, forded through a stream, and tried to get up a mountainside on a rocky road.
We forded <fex>from the island</fex> to the mainland.
We decided to cut <fex>through the forest</fex>.
I'll cut across the Sahara desert <fex>up to Algeria and Morocco</fex>.
We followed the trail (which is well marked with cairns) and then cut <fex>west</fex> across a grassy meadow for about 1000 feet to the crest of  the nearby saddle lying below North Peak.
The Federal Army of the Potomac forded the river <fex>in August 1862</fex>.
The common brook is best forded <fex>south of the hut</fex>.
<fex>John</fex> attempted to climb Mt. Everest.
John attempted <fex>to climb Mt. Everest</fex>.
<fex>On the bridge</fex> he attempted to put the wig on.
<fex>Rain</fex> is fairly unlikely today, I think.
There is a high chance of rain <fex>today</fex>.
There is a high chance of rain <fex>in Seattle</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Ampex Museum of Magnetic Recording
VERA - the Visual Electronic Recording Apparatus
